notes: Catalog entries define terrain TYPES (what a piece is).
Scenario/Map uses terrain_instances.json to place copies.
All entries include the same schema sections (footprint/visibility/cover/elevation/movement/interaction/slots/destructibility) even when minimal.

visibility.blocks_los_when: Blocks partial line of sight if line passes through the entrance face at ground level

interactions.name: Enter the Mine
interactions.on_success: Place this model in Mine Network (scenario-defined) or gain 1 Hidden token.
interactions.on_fail: Cave air: model becomes Pressured until end of round.

slots.label: Mine Mouth
notes: Scenario builder can use as a spawn/exit or objective anchor.

slots.label: Mine Story Anchor
notes: Hooks for events: cave-in, echoes, hidden loot.

visibility.blocks_los_when: Never blocks line of sight

interactions.name: Operate Control Panel
interactions.on_success: Flip/advance scenario state (doors, lights, rails, alarms).
interactions.on_fail: Alarm: nearest enemy gains +1 die vs this model‚Äôs next defense.

breakpoints.effect: Disabled: interactions on this panel are no longer available.

visibility.blocks_los_when: Blocks LoS through solid walls; firing slits allow partial LoS out

breakpoints.effect: Cracked cover: edges cover drops from Heavy to Light.
Breach: interior becomes passable; treat as rubble.

visibility.blocks_los_when: Blocks LoS when line crosses the wall segment at equal or lower elevation

test.on_fail: Fall back: remain on original side; take 1 die damage

breakpoints.effect: Breach: becomes passable gap (treat as Difficult rubble crossing).

visibility.blocks_los_when: Main supports block partially; platform provides elevated firing

breakpoints.effect: Shaken supports: climb tests now require Quality 2.
Collapse: platforms become impassable rubble; models on platforms take 2 dice damage.

visibility.blocks_los_when: Never blocks line of sight

slots.label: Trail Story Anchor
notes: Use for patrol routes, tracks, ambush triggers.

visibility.blocks_los_when: Bridge deck does not block LoS; supports can partially block at ground level

breakpoints.effect: Cracked deck: Bridge Deck counts as Difficult terrain.
Collapse: place a 6" rubble hazard beneath; deck becomes impassable gap.

notes: Replace collapse area with Unstable Terrain patch.

visibility.blocks_los_when: Partially blocks LoS across the altar mass

interactions.name: Consecrate / Desecrate
interactions.on_success: Gain 1 Ritual point or flip altar control to your faction.
interactions.on_fail: Backlash: take 1 die damage (echo burn / dread).

slots.label: Altar Objective Anchor
notes: Place Artifact or Ritual token here.

visibility.blocks_los_when: Never blocks line of sight

interactions.name: Work the Circle
interactions.on_success: Place/advance Ritual progress (scenario-defined).
interactions.on_fail: Disruption: lose 1 progress or become Pressured.

visibility.blocks_los_when: Partially blocks LoS through broken walls

interactions.name: Risk the Collapse
interactions.on_success: Choose: gain 1 Loot token OR force an enemy within 3" to take 1 die damage (falling debris).
interactions.on_fail: Collapse: this area becomes Unstable Terrain; acting model takes 2 dice damage.

slots.label: Collapse Anchor
notes: Scenario can convert this into an Unstable patch.

breakpoints.effect: Full collapse: replace with Unstable Terrain patch.

visibility.blocks_los_when: Never blocks line of sight

interactions.name: Extract / Evacuate
interactions.on_success: Scenario-defined extraction (remove model/objective).

visibility.blocks_los_when: Never blocks line of sight

slots.label: Crack Anchor
notes: Hook for 'fall through' or tremor events.

visibility.blocks_los_when: Never blocks line of sight

interactions.name: Throw a Switch
interactions.on_success: Advance rail event (scenario-defined).
interactions.on_fail: Jammed: cannot be used again this round.

visibility.blocks_los_when: Never blocks line of sight

slots.label: Boardwalk Anchor
notes: Great for streetfront scenes and chases.

breakpoints.effect: Broken planks: becomes Difficult terrain.

visibility.blocks_los_when: Tank mass partially blocks LoS; legs do not

test.on_fail: Slip: remain at current level; take 1 die damage

interactions.name: Tap the Tower
interactions.on_success: Gain 1 Water token (or scenario resource).
interactions.on_fail: Valve seized: cannot be tapped again this round.

breakpoints.effect: Leaking: ground within 3" counts as Difficult (mud/wet).
Collapse: models on levels 1-2 take 3 dice damage; replace with large rubble.

visibility.blocks_los_when: Partially blocks LoS across the wreck bulk

interactions.name: Search the Wreck
interactions.on_success: Gain 1 Loot token.

visibility.blocks_los_when: Blocks LoS through rock mass

slots.label: Outcrop Anchor
notes: Good perch or hidden cache spot.

visibility.blocks_los_when: Blocks LoS through rock mass

test.on_fail: Slip: take 1 die damage; remain at base

slots.label: High Ground Objective
notes: Place artifact here for dramatic play.

visibility.blocks_los_when: Mesa sides block LoS when line crosses cliff face at equal elevation

test.on_fail: Fall: take 2 dice damage; remain at base

slots.label: Mesa Top Objective
notes: Signature 'fight for the high ground' point.

slots.label: Cliff Edge Anchor
notes: Use for fall risk / shove effects.

visibility.blocks_los_when: Low mounds/roots partially block LoS

interactions.name: Soothe / Stake Out
interactions.on_success: Gain 1 Monster Clue token (or scenario objective progress).

breakpoints.effect: Destroyed: remove den; place rubble/ash patch.

visibility.blocks_los_when: Broken spans partially block LoS; gaps do not

slots.label: Ruins Anchor
notes: Use for chase hazards or collapse triggers.

visibility.blocks_los_when: Broken stone walls partially block LoS

interactions.name: Study the Ruins
interactions.on_success: Gain 1 Lore token or reveal a secret (scenario-defined).

visibility.blocks_los_when: Pyramid mass blocks LoS through its body

test.on_fail: Lose footing: remain at current level; take 1 die damage

interactions.name: Apex Rite
interactions.on_success: Gain 1 Ritual point and 1 Lore token.

visibility.blocks_los_when: Blocks LoS through statue mass

test.on_fail: Fall: take 2 dice damage; remain at base

interactions.name: Invoke the Effigy
interactions.on_success: Reveal/flip a Tzul effect (scenario-defined).

visibility.blocks_los_when: Blocks LoS through statue mass; counts as tall blocker

test.on_fail: Fall: take 3 dice damage; remain at base

interactions.name: Awaken the Colossus (Risky)
interactions.on_success: Trigger major Tzul event (scenario-defined).
interactions.on_fail: Catastrophic backlash: take 3 dice damage; create a 3" Tainted Ground zone.

slots.label: Monument Objective
notes: Place a faction banner / obelisk marker here.

visibility.blocks_los_when: Provides concealment: treat LoS through as partial

interactions.name: Harvest Samples
interactions.on_success: Gain 1 Sample token (counts as Loot or Lore).

breakpoints.effect: Burned/cleared: remove concealment; becomes open ground.

visibility.blocks_los_when: Never blocks line of sight

interactions.name: Dig Up Cache
interactions.on_success: Gain 2 Supply tokens (or 1 Loot + 1 Resource).

visibility.blocks_los_when: Never blocks line of sight

slots.label: Unstable Anchor
notes: Use for cave-in, sink, detonation, storm effects.

visibility.blocks_los_when: Partially blocks LoS across the pile
Partially blocks LoS close to ground
Partially blocks LoS close to ground
Partially blocks LoS close to ground
Blocks LoS through walls

interactions.name: Search the Shed
interactions.on_success: Gain 1 Supply token.

breakpoints.effect: Destroyed: replace with small rubble.

visibility.blocks_los_when: Blocks LoS through walls; doorways grant partial LoS

interactions.name: Search the Barn
interactions.on_success: Gain 1 Supply token and 1 Food token.

breakpoints.effect: Roof damage: loft loses cover (Light -> None).
Collapse: loft becomes impassable rubble; models on loft take 2 dice damage.

visibility.blocks_los_when: Provides partial LoS through tall rows

slots.label: Field Anchor
notes: Good for stealth lanes and crop fires.

visibility.blocks_los_when: Never blocks line of sight
Blocks LoS through walls; windows grant partial LoS

interactions.name: Ransack House
interactions.on_success: Gain 1 Loot token and 1 Food token.
interactions.on_fail: Noise: nearest enemy gains +1 die vs you next attack.

breakpoints.effect: Windows shattered: interior cover reduced (Light -> None in affected rooms).
Collapse: roof becomes impassable rubble; anyone on roof takes 2 dice damage.

visibility.blocks_los_when: Blocks LoS through metal shell

interactions.name: Loot the Hut
interactions.on_success: Gain 1 Mechanical Parts token and 1 Supply token.
interactions.on_fail: Locked down: take 1 die damage (shock/cut) and gain nothing.

breakpoints.effect: Shell breached: edges cover drops from Heavy to Light.
Caved in: replace with large rubble.

visibility.blocks_los_when: Blocks LoS through walls; windows/doors partial

interactions.name: Scavenge the Cantina
interactions.on_success: Gain 1 Loot token. If you have a Social/Charm hook, gain +1 extra token (scenario-defined).

breakpoints.effect: Interior wrecked: interior cover becomes None.
Collapse: replace with large rubble.

visibility.blocks_los_when: Broken walls partially block LoS

interactions.name: Search the Ruins
interactions.on_success: Gain 1 Loot token.

visibility.blocks_los_when: Blocks LoS through walls; stained windows are partial

interactions.name: Sanctify / Profane
interactions.on_success: Gain 1 Faith token (or flip a Consecration state).

breakpoints.effect: Cracked stone: edges cover drops from Heavy to Light.
Collapse: replace with large rubble; models inside take 2 dice damage.

visibility.blocks_los_when: Broken walls partially block LoS

interactions.name: Search the Ruined Church
interactions.on_success: Gain 1 Lore token.

visibility.blocks_los_when: Blocks LoS through walls; many windows are partial

interactions.name: Search for Intel
interactions.on_success: Gain 1 Intel token (counts as Loot).
interactions.on_fail: Compromised: nearest enemy gains +1 die vs you next attack.

breakpoints.effect: Interior wrecked: interior cover becomes None.
Collapse: replace with large rubble.

visibility.blocks_los_when: Broken walls partially block LoS

interactions.name: Search the Ruins
interactions.on_success: Gain 1 Loot token.

visibility.blocks_los_when: Blocks LoS through walls; windows partial

interactions.name: Loot the Shop
interactions.on_success: Gain 1 Supply token and 1 Loot token.

breakpoints.effect: Shelves smashed: interior cover becomes None.
Collapse: replace with large rubble.

visibility.blocks_los_when: Broken walls partially block LoS

interactions.name: Search the Ruined Shop
interactions.on_success: Gain 1 Supply token.

visibility.blocks_los_when: Blocks LoS through walls

interactions.name: Search the House
interactions.on_success: Gain 1 Loot token.
interactions.on_fail: Noise: nearest enemy gains +1 die vs you next attack.

breakpoints.effect: Windows shattered: interior cover becomes None.
Collapse: replace with large rubble.

visibility.blocks_los_when: Broken walls and collapsed sections partially block LoS

interactions.name: Search the Ruins
interactions.on_success: Gain 1 Loot or Supply token (scenario choice).
interactions.on_fail: Disturb unstable debris; this unit suffers 1 die damage.

slots.label: Civilian Remains / Clue
notes: Scenario hook, narrative trigger, or investigation point.

breakpoints.effect: Further collapse: interior becomes hazardous terrain.
Total collapse: replace with rubble.

notes: Any units inside take 1 die damage when collapse occurs.

visibility.blocks_los_when: Blocks LoS through exterior walls; windows/doors grant partial LoS

levels.name: Lobby / Ground Floor
notes: Long hallways, rooms, and furniture cover.

interactions.name: Search Rooms
interactions.on_success: Gain 1 Loot token and 1 Supply token (or scenario-defined intel).
interactions.on_fail: Ruckus: nearest enemy gains +1 die vs this model‚Äôs next defense.

slots.label: Guest Ledger
notes: Scenario hooks: names, clues, blackmail, cult check-ins.

breakpoints.effect: Windows blown out: interior cover reduced (Light -> None) on level 0 only.
Partial collapse: roof becomes Difficult; anyone on roof takes 1 die damage.
Total collapse: replace with large rubble; models inside take 2 dice damage.

notes: Replace footprint with large rubble field.

visibility.blocks_los_when: Broken walls and collapsed floors partially block LoS

levels.name: Rubble Interior
notes: Open breaches; lots of debris cover.

levels.name: Broken Upper Floor
notes: Precarious perch (counts as dangerous high ground).

test.on_fail: Slip: remain at level 0; take 1 die damage

interactions.name: Search the Ruin
interactions.on_success: Gain 1 Loot token (or 1 Intel token if scenario uses intel).
interactions.on_fail: Unstable floor: acting model becomes Pressured until end of round.

visibility.blocks_los_when: Upper walls block LoS; the open space beneath does not

levels.name: Understructure
notes: Open shade beneath the building; stilts provide partial blockers.

breakpoints.effect: Shattered supports: climb tests now require Quality 2.
Collapse: raised floor becomes impassable rubble; models on level 1 take 2 dice damage.

visibility.blocks_los_when: Never blocks line of sight

interactions.name: Open Supply Crate
interactions.on_success: Gain 1 Supply token (or scenario-defined resource).

slots.label: Crate Loot Anchor
notes: Recommended: place 3‚Äì4 crates for a crate cluster.

breakpoints.effect: Smashed: crate is destroyed.

visibility.blocks_los_when: Partially blocks LoS near ground due to multiple crate edges

interactions.name: Scavenge Crates
interactions.on_success: Gain 1 Supply token. If scenario uses scaling, place (danger+1) instances across the map.

visibility.blocks_los_when: Partially blocks LoS across the crate bulk

interactions.name: Secure Cargo
interactions.on_success: Mark this cargo as Secured (scenario-defined) or gain 1 Loot token.
interactions.on_fail: Damaged seal: cargo counts as Contested until end of round.

breakpoints.effect: Crate burst: drop contents; replace with rubble.

visibility.blocks_los_when: Blocks LoS through walls; loading door grants partial LoS if opened

interactions.name: Breach the Depot
interactions.on_success: Depot opened: gain 2 Supply tokens (or scenario-defined stock). After success, this depot becomes passable for the rest of the game.
interactions.on_fail: Lock bites back: take 1 die damage (cut/shock) and become Pressured.

breakpoints.effect: Breached wall: edges cover drops from Heavy to Light.
Caved in: replace with medium rubble.

visibility.blocks_los_when: Partially blocks LoS close to ground due to stacked goods

interactions.name: Collect Supplies
interactions.on_success: Gain 1 Supply token and 1 Food token (if scenario uses Food).

breakpoints.effect: Scattered: becomes rubble.

visibility.blocks_los_when: Blocks LoS through engine bulk

test.on_fail: Slip: remain at base; take 1 die damage

interactions.name: Stoke / Operate Engine
interactions.on_success: Advance train/rail scenario state (move, whistle, power).
interactions.on_fail: Scalding steam: take 1 die damage and become Pressured.

slots.label: Cab Control
notes: Use as control point in rail scenarios.

breakpoints.effect: Damaged boiler: stoke/operate difficulty +1.
Wrecked: replace with large rubble/wreck.

visibility.blocks_los_when: Blocks LoS through twisted metal mass

interactions.name: Salvage Components
interactions.on_success: Gain 1 Mechanical Parts token.

visibility.blocks_los_when: Blocks LoS through engine bulk

test.on_fail: Slip: take 1 die damage; remain at base

interactions.name: Secure Derail Site
interactions.on_success: Mark as Secured (scenario-defined) and gain 1 Loot token.
interactions.on_fail: Steam burst: take 1 die damage and become Pressured.

slots.label: Derail Objective Anchor
notes: Core objective point in rail scenarios.

slots.label: Derail Story Anchor
notes: Hooks: fire, survivors, cargo spill, monster scent trail.

visibility.blocks_los_when: Blocks LoS through piled cars; gaps allow partial LoS

interactions.name: Pry Open Cargo
interactions.on_success: Gain 1 Loot token OR 1 Supply token (scenario choice).

visibility.blocks_los_when: Provides partial LoS through heaps and frames

interactions.name: Salvage the Yard
interactions.on_success: Gain 1 Mechanical Parts token. If scenario uses escalation, you may also gain 1 Supply token.

visibility.blocks_los_when: Partially blocks LoS due to coils and frame

interactions.name: Charge / Disrupt Dynamo
interactions.on_success: Flip Dynamo state (Powered/Disabled). Scenario-defined effects: shields, doors, ray-boost, alarms.
interactions.on_fail: Arc shock: take 1 die damage and become Pressured.

slots.label: Dynamo Objective Anchor
notes: Use as a control objective for Monsterology tech.

slots.label: Arc Hazard Anchor
notes: Hooks for shock fields / misfire events.

breakpoints.effect: Sparking: all interact tests here are +1 difficulty.
Destroyed: Dynamo is Disabled permanently.

notes: Replace with scrap and broken coils.

visibility.blocks_los_when: Frames and pipes partially block LoS

interactions.name: Extract / Sabotage Thyr
interactions.on_success: Gain 1 Thyr token (or advance extraction progress). Alternatively, mark Rig as Sabotaged (scenario-defined).
interactions.on_fail: Pressure burst: take 1 die damage and create a 3" Unstable Terrain patch adjacent (scenario-defined placement).

breakpoints.effect: Damaged rig: extract/sabotage difficulty +1.
Destroyed: replace with medium rubble; create Unstable Terrain in footprint.

visibility.blocks_los_when: Engine frame partially blocks LoS; flames/smoke do not

interactions.name: Tune / Overload Infernal Engine
interactions.on_success: Choose: Power Surge (scenario-defined boon) OR Overload (create a 3" Tainted Ground zone adjacent and mark engine unstable).
interactions.on_fail: Backfire: take 2 dice damage and become Pressured.

slots.label: Backfire Anchor
notes: Hooks for flames, corruption, catastrophic events.

breakpoints.effect: Unstable: all interact tests here are +1 difficulty.
Meltdown: replace with medium rubble and create a 3" Tainted Ground zone centered on this terrain.

visibility.blocks_los_when: Partially blocks LoS due to tall marker

interactions.name: Claim Territory
interactions.on_success: Flip/control this marker for your faction (scenario-defined scoring).
interactions.on_fail: Contested: no flip; acting model becomes Pressured.

slots.label: Territory Objective Anchor
notes: Recommended: place 3 territory markers for control scenarios.

visibility.blocks_los_when: Never blocks line of sight

interactions.name: Survey / Record
interactions.on_success: Gain 1 Lore token or advance scenario navigation state.

slots.label: Survey Anchor
notes: Good for navigation and boundary disputes.

visibility.blocks_los_when: Never blocks line of sight

interactions.name: Tag Waypoint
interactions.on_success: Mark waypoint as Visited (scenario-defined scoring or movement bonus).

slots.label: Waypoint Objective
notes: Recommended: place 2 waypoint markers for route scenarios.

visibility.blocks_los_when: Partially blocks LoS due to cargo bulk

interactions.name: Advance the Cargo
interactions.on_success: Move this cargo up to 3" in a scenario-legal direction (or advance an escort track).
interactions.on_fail: Snagged: cargo does not move; acting model becomes Pressured.

slots.label: Escort Objective Anchor
notes: Scenario builder should treat this as a movable objective instance.

slots.label: Cargo Manifest
notes: Hooks: stolen goods, contraband, monster bait, Thyr shipment.

breakpoints.effect: Cargo destroyed: replace with small rubble and drop contents token (scenario-defined).

visibility.blocks_los_when: Solid faces block LoS; firing slits grant partial LoS out

breakpoints.effect: Cracked cover: edges cover drops from Heavy to Light.
Breach: interior becomes passable; treat as rubble.

visibility.blocks_los_when: Does not fully block LoS; provides partial obstruction along the line

test.on_fail: Stumble: remain on original side; action spent

slots.label: Barricade Anchor
notes: Recommended: place 2 barricades for defensive setups.

breakpoints.effect: Breach: becomes passable; cover reduced to Light.

visibility.blocks_los_when: Blocks LoS through walls; door grants partial LoS

interactions.name: Loot Depot
interactions.on_success: Gain 2 Supply tokens (or 1 Supply + 1 Loot).

breakpoints.effect: Destroyed: replace with small rubble.

visibility.blocks_los_when: Never blocks line of sight

interactions.name: Cleanse / Contaminate
interactions.on_success: Remove this Tainted Ground zone (or flip it to Blessed/Safe if scenario uses states).
interactions.on_fail: Backlash: acting model takes 1 die damage and becomes Pressured.

visibility.blocks_los_when: Never blocks line of sight

interactions.name: Claim the Artifact
interactions.on_success: Pick up/secure artifact (scenario-defined carry rules).

slots.label: Artifact Objective
notes: Recommended placement: on high ground or rooftop.

visibility.blocks_los_when: Partially blocks LoS due to crystal clusters

interactions.name: Harvest / Consume Thyr
interactions.on_success: Gain 1 Thyr token (or apply a Thyr boost per faction rules).

visibility.blocks_los_when: Partially blocks LoS due to stacked barrels

interactions.name: Collect Water
interactions.on_success: Gain 1 Water token (or scenario resource).

breakpoints.effect: Burst/leak: footprint becomes Difficult (mud/wet) for the rest of the game.

notes: Replace with debris; treat area as wet/difficult if scenario supports it.

visibility.blocks_los_when: Never blocks line of sight

interactions.name: Collect Food
interactions.on_success: Gain 1 Food token (or 1 Supply token if scenario doesn‚Äôt track Food).

breakpoints.effect: Smashed: remove.

visibility.blocks_los_when: Partial LoS through stacked parts and frames

interactions.name: Collect Parts
interactions.on_success: Gain 1 Mechanical Parts token.

visibility.blocks_los_when: Partial LoS due to stacked ingots/crates

interactions.name: Secure Stockpile
interactions.on_success: Gain 1 Loot token OR mark stockpile as Controlled (scenario-defined scoring).

visibility.blocks_los_when: Coal heap provides partial LoS obstruction near ground

interactions.name: Collect Coal
interactions.on_success: Gain 1 Fuel/Coal token (or Supply token if scenario doesn‚Äôt track fuel).

visibility.blocks_los_when: Fence rails do not block LoS; animals/pen clutter can grant partial

interactions.name: Herd / Free Livestock
interactions.on_success: Gain 1 Food token OR advance escort/rescue objective (scenario-defined).
interactions.on_fail: Stampede: acting model takes 1 die damage or is pushed 1" (scenario-defined).

breakpoints.effect: Fence smashed: becomes open ground; edge cover removed.

visibility.blocks_los_when: Never blocks line of sight

interactions.name: Claim Hoard
interactions.on_success: Gain 2 Loot tokens (or mark hoard as Secured for scoring).

visibility.blocks_los_when: Blocks LoS through reinforced walls; firing slit windows are partial

interactions.name: Raid the Armory
interactions.on_success: Gain 2 Supply tokens OR 1 Loot + 1 Mechanical Parts (scenario choice).

breakpoints.effect: Breached: edges cover drops from Heavy to Light.
Detonation/collapse: replace with large rubble; create Unstable Terrain in footprint (scenario-defined).
